definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Or “Cartier: You’ll be sorry you didn’t.”
sentences.chinese: 或“卡地亞，遺憾未曾擁有”。

sentences.english: Her with Cartier ring, the light, let me squint his eyes a half.
sentences.chinese: 她帶着卡地亞的戒指，發出的光，讓阿三半眯着雙眼。

sentences.english: Cartier is synonymous the world over with excellence jewellery and watchmaking.
sentences.chinese: 卡地亞是享譽世界的著名珠寶腕錶品牌。

definition: Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
perpetual calendar/ten thousand year calendar/Islamic calendar introduced to Yuan China by Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
